nodes.text: The Nubia Star Drives, Incorporated Courier-class yacht was a sleek and speedy yacht produced for the rich and those wanting a sporting craft.

The Courier-class yacht was a long and sleek-hulled craft, aerodynamic, with a pair of trim wings that tipped upwards at the end. At the base of these wings, twin engines were mounted, giving the craft excellent speed for its size.

Highly modifiable, Arend Shen modified his own Courier-class yacht, the Venture, for extra luxury and extra speed. Even after modifications, the yacht retained three extra hard points for further modification, owing to the versatility of the craft.
